result.execSummary:
The deferred prosecution or sentencing agreement(s) on this case were fulfilled, and the charge(s) were dismissed.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Curtis Lee Mitchell Jr

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Curtis Lee Mitchell in court with attorney Gabriela A Leija.  Brad Alan Vorpahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  sdg

The defendant has complied with the Deferred Prosecution Agreement.  On motion of the State, Court ordered case dismissed with prejudice.  Bail to be returned if applicable.
Proof of Community Service.  Filed, sdg.

Defendant Curtis Lee Mitchell in court with attorney Gabriela A Leija.  Brad Alan Vorpahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  sdg

Based upon the defendant's compliance with Deferred Prosecution Agreement, matter is adjourned for final review hearing in Branch 33.  Review hearing scheduled for June 27, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Curtis Lee Mitchell in court with attorney Gabriela A Leija.  Taylor L. Kraus appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  

The parties have agreed to a deferred judgment agreement.The defendant was advised of his constitutional rights and maximum penalties, waived all rights, pled GUILTY and was examined as to the plea.  Plea Questionaire/Wiaver of Rights and Addendum to Plea Questionaire received and filed.  The parties stipulate to the complaint as a factual basis for the plea.  The Court found the defendant guilty but WITHHELD entry of Judgement of Conviction.  The Court reviewed the Intake Requirement and Further Conditions with the defendant.  The court approved the Deferred Prosecution Agreement and ordered the proceedings transferred for a review hearing before Judge Ashley, Branch 33.


  Review hearing scheduled for March 7, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Curtis Lee Mitchell in court with attorney Gabriela A Leija.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  Due to inclement weather, the courthouse closed early.  Court ordered case adjourned for DPAH in Branch 21.  Stipulated request for adjournment received and filed.  Deferred Prosecution Agreement Hearing scheduled for January 14, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Curtis Lee Mitchell in court with attorney Gabriela A Leija.  Daniel J. Gabler appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  Defense counsel is working on resolving this matter with DPA.  Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 24.  Parties are advised that effective December 14, 2015, this case will be assigned to the Reserve Judge presiding in Branch 21 in room 622 of the Courthouse.  Plea hearing scheduled for December 28, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Court ordered Justice Point Pretrial Services "Court Reminders."

Defendant Curtis Lee Mitchell in court with attorney Barbara K Due.  Defendant Curtis Lee Mitchell in custody.  Katryna L. Childs appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk:  hgj.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT.  Scheduling conference scheduled for November 30, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Prior: 1145 Roland Ln, Apt 4, Green Bay, WI 54303 United States
Bail Forfeiture Notice resent per updated address information

ADDRESS INFO for Curtis Lee Mitchell Jr
Current: 1145 Roland Ln, Apt 4, Green Bay, WI 54303 United States  (Effective: 09-17-2015)

Notice of bond forfeiture mailed to defendant; Original in file. ($200.00 signature bond) gj
Signature bond ordered to be forfeited in the amount of 200.00.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH  WARRANT.

Attorney Ramon Arellano Valdez in court.  Joy Hammond appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a bench warrant to be issued.  State's motion for Judgment of Bond Forfeiture 30 days after notification from Clerk of Circuit Court's Office is granted by the Court.

Defendant Curtis Lee Mitchell in court with attorney Paul J. Manley.  Joy Hammond appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  Defense counsel moves to withdraw due to a conflict within his office.  Court grants motion.  Court ordered case adjourned for status of counsel in Branch 24.  Status conference scheduled for September 1, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Curtis Lee Mitchell in court with attorney Paul J. Manley.  Daniel J. Gabler appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Stipulated request for adjournment received and filed.  Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 24. lr  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for 08-20-2015 at 01:30 pm.
No use or possession of any controlled substances without a valid prescription  Pre-trial conference scheduled for 06-16-2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Curtis Lee Mitchell in court.  Ronald Dague appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant advised that this case is assigned to Judge Protasiewicz, Branch 24.
Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.   Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel and maximum penalties.  Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant. Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance.  Defendant IS Public Defender eligible.  Defendant is ordered to provide the public defender's office with the next court date.  The case is adjourned to Br.24  for a Pretrial Conference.VB
SUMMONS MAILED. DEFENDANT ORDERED INTO ROOM 221 SAFETY BUILDING ON 6/2/15 @ 1:30 pm
